snippet.title: Viola: The Heroine's Melody Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Viola: The Heroine's Melody will hit her 1.0 release on February 17!

Wishlist or buy Viola on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/988310/Viola_The_Heroines_Melody/
Follow her on Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/GameViola
Or join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/4ZSmhKG

Viola: The Heroine's Melody is the musical Platformer/RPG! After failing at violin practice for the hundredth time, Viola becomes trapped inside her instrument's fantastical world. Join her adventure to find her way back home, aided by the diverse ensemble of friends she meets along the way.

* Play as the young Viola, who is trapped inside the fantasy world of a magic violin.
* Create your own party from a colorful cast of 10+ characters!
* Platforming and RPG battles seamlessly combined in a beautiful pixel art package.
* Play musical instruments to unlock passages, secrets, and more!
* A humorous and emotional story about learning to love yourself.
